Summary: a glowing pulsating cigar shaped light moving slowly east
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving down nine mile towards graiot and a strange light caught my eye.At first i thought maybe it was a helicopter or a air plane but it had no flashing lights. It looked like a glowing blimp shaped object slowly moving east. i just stared at it trying to figure what it was.I went to a friend house to show them they all went outside and couldnt explain what it was either.we followed it down the street on foot until it went behind trees in the distance and we lost track of it.The night was a clear night.
